column2:
ADJECTIVE

Lacking initiative or strength of character; irresponsible.
‘her ___ younger brother’

NOUN

1A collection of wild animals kept in captivity for exhibition.  
‘He is a ‘country boy at heart’, a farmer's son from just outside the Lanarkshire town, who grew up among a bizarre __s of animals that he refers to as ‘a crazy sort of petting zoo’ and that include two ostriches.’

VERB

[WITH OBJECT]
Put on (an item of clothing)
‘in the dressing room the players __d their football shirts’
